subject: Soccer
Gold Cup (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
Spanish Language
Mexican-Americans
lead_paragraph: Trips to the United States by Mexico’s national soccer team, including a sold-out game at the new Meadowlands stadium on Friday night, are big business.
snippet: Trips to the United States by Mexico’s national soccer team, including a sold-out game at the new Meadowlands stadium on Friday night, are big business.
